name: Caliber

task.name: wineexec
task.exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe WoTLauncher.exe

content:
files:
- game:
    filename: caliber_install_ru_bzt2v7062gk3.exe
    url: https://wds.gcdn.co/wgc/releases_tTrHgLCKHBRiaL/wgc_19.08.00.7992_ru/caliber_install_ru.exe?enctid=bzt2v7062gk3&pub_id=WGC&lpurl=https%3A%2F%2Fredirect.wargaming.net%2FWGC%2Finternal%2FWargaming_Game_Center_Install_CLBR_RU.exe&sid=SIDyy6F1XdxanM9t7QMIn2z6vmDN0aVzr7UN1apBRvQxJ_YoCxybiZBJJyVGsKmd7CKgLBcYGrNzNXkit9GtH8h-Uba_jr6chpddSrShh_0sdVtDkNljzrSK9V05lX-EWRa0m-grfsTQiRZF0vXm-LI3HU3&enctid=bzt2v7062gk3&lpsn=Caliber_prem_shop_test&utm_source=wg_web_site&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=wgc-install-clbr-ru-2&utm_content=wgc
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/Caliber/Caliber.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: Installing Caliber
    exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe
      WoTLauncher.exe
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts win10
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
